name: Launch in dark theme
description: Start Ultralight with dark chrome, toolbars, and tabs by default.

name: Enable ad blocking
description: Filter network requests using bundled block lists to hide intrusive ads.

name: Log blocked requests
description: Write each blocked network request to the console for debugging rules.

name: Show address bar suggestions
description: Surface history matches and popular sites while typing in the address bar.

name: Show favicons in suggestions
description: Display site icons next to suggestion rows whenever an icon is available.

name: Show download badge
description: Highlight the toolbar downloads button whenever transfers are active.

name: Open downloads panel automatically
description: Pop open the quick downloads overlay as soon as a new download begins.

name: Clear history on exit
description: Remove browsing history when Ultralight closes and skip saving new visits.

name: Transparent toolbar
description: Blend the toolbar into page content with a translucent, glass-like surface.

name: Compact tabs
description: Reduce tab height and spacing so more tabs stay visible without scrolling.

name: Reduce motion effects
description: Limit animated transitions and parallax flourishes for a calmer experience.

name: High contrast UI
description: Boost contrast for overlays, menus, and dialogs to improve readability.

name: Vibrant window theme
description: Apply a subtle color wash to the window frame for a livelier finish.
